title: Climate-resilient municipality of Bayreuth using the example of Sankt Georgen
description: As part of this final project for our bachelor's degree, we examined the climate resilience of two sub-areas within a city district. It became clear that the newly planned sub-area has greater climate resilience than the older building structures in the long-established sub-area.
authors: Jela DÃ¼sselmann, Sina Lindner, Tim Neynaber, Louis Schmalisch
